verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, understanding \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*,

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* Doeg \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Edomite \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w told|strong="H0413"\w* Saul David \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* house \w of|strong="H5030"\w* Achimelech. [1 Kings 22]
Why dost thou glory \w in|strong="H0430"\w* malice, thou \w that|strong="H0430"\w* art \w mighty|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* iniquity?
All \w the|strong="H2891"\w* day long thy tongue hath devised injustice: as \w a|strong="H3526"\w* sharp razor, thou hast wrought deceit.

Thou hast loved malice \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* goodness: \w and|strong="H3045"\w* iniquity \w rather|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3045"\w* speak righteousness.
Thou hast loved all \w the|strong="H8199"\w* words \w of|strong="H5869"\w* ruin, O deceitful tongue.

Therefore \w will|strong="H5771"\w* God destroy thee \w for|strong="H5771"\w* ever: \w he|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* pluck thee \w out|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* remove thee \w from|strong="H0517"\w* thy dwelling place: \w and|strong="H5771"\w* thy root \w out|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H2005"\w* land \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H2005"\w* living.

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* just \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* \w see|strong="H2005"\w* \w and|strong="H2451"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* laugh \w at|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* say:

Behold \w the|strong="H2398"\w* man \w that|strong="H0231"\w* made not God \w his|strong="H3526"\w* helper: But trusted \w in|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H2398"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H7950"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* riches: \w and|strong="H2398"\w* prevailed \w in|strong="H2398"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* vanity.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w*, \w as|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* fruitful olive tree \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* house \w of|strong="H6106"\w* God, \w have|strong="H8085"\w* hoped \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* mercy \w of|strong="H6106"\w* God \w for|strong="H8085"\w* ever, yea \w for|strong="H8085"\w* ever \w and|strong="H8085"\w* ever.

\w I|strong="H5771"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* praise thee \w for|strong="H3605"\w* ever, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* thou hast \w done|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H5771"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* wait \w on|strong="H3605"\w* thy name, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* good \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* thy saints.
